attributes.action: Rate all products bought by builders, landlords and private householders, with the express intention of improving the thermal efficiency of their properties (thereby reducing carbon emissions) VAT exempt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now well established that if domestic heating demands can be reduced then there will follow a corresponding reduction in carbon emissions. It seems illogical then to tax householders, builders and landlords for improving their properties with the intention of reducing carbon emissions.
